scripts.start-prod-pm2: NODE_ENV=production pm2 start src/index.js --name discord --log-date-format 'MMM-DD HH:mm:ss ZZ'
scripts.restart-prod-pm2: NODE_ENV=production pm2 restart discord --log-date-format 'MMM-DD HH:mm:ss ZZ'
scripts.start-dev-pm2: NODE_ENV=development pm2 start src/index.js --name discord-dev --log-date-format 'MMM-DD HH:mm:ss ZZ'
scripts.restart-dev-pm2: NODE_ENV=development pm2 restart discord-dev --log-date-format 'MMM-DD HH:mm:ss ZZ'
